DataElement.preferredName: MAX-PC 15 How Much Past Week No Future Plan Due to Unpredictable Cancer Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of how much they agree with not being able to plan for the future because cancer is unpredictable in the past week, using a four point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified 18-Item Memorial Anxiety Scale for Prostate Cancer How Much Past Week Cannot Plan for the Future Because Cancer is Unpredictable Agreement Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An 18-item questionnaire designed to facilitate the identification and assessment of men with prostate cancer-related anxiety._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._The most recent week, including today._A question about an individual's agreement concerning not being able to plan for the future because cancer is unpredictable._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Modified 18-Item Memorial Anxiety Scale for Prostate Cancer
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
An 18-item questionnaire designed to facilitate the identification and
assessment of men with prostate cancer-related anxiety.

Concepts.longName: Modified 18-Item Memorial Anxiety Scale for Prostate Cancer
Concepts.definition: An 18-item questionnaire designed to facilitate the identification and assessment of men with prostate cancer-related anxiety.

Property.preferredName: Quantity Past Week Cannot Plan for the Future Because Cancer is Unpredictable Agreement Score
Property.preferredDefinition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:The most recent week, including today.:A question about an individual's agreement concerning not being able to plan for the future because cancer is unpredictable.:The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Cannot Plan for the Future Because Cancer is Unpredictable
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's agreement concerning not being able to plan for the future because cancer is unpredictable.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: MAX-PC:Memorial Anxiety Scale for Prostate Cancer. A.Roth, et.al., Cancer 2003;97:2910-8.
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave per request by D.Laurence. mc 1/7/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard related to the level of agreement an individual believes about their own health as measured by the MAX-PC scale.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
